text:
修を献身的に支える幼馴染ヒロイン・音無絢奈を修から寝取る親友キャラ・雪代斗和に、だ。
幸いゲームのストーリー開始まで一年も猶予がある。
自分に寝取りの趣味はないし、俺が彼女を奪わなければ二人は幸せに結ばれるはず……なのに。
「二人っきり……ですね？」
修がいなくなった途端に体を密着させてきた絢奈は膝の上に乗ってきて──もしかしてこの二人、ゲーム開始前からすでに関係しているのか!?
これってＮＴＲ（寝取られ）？
ＢＳＳ（僕が先に好きだったのに）？
trans:
The loyal childhood friend heroine, Ayana Otonashi, who selfishly supports Osamu, ends up being stolen by his best friend, Towa Yukishiro.
Luckily, there is still a year until the game's storyline begins.
I am not into the whole stealing someone else's partner thing, and if I do not interfere, the two of them should end up happily together... or so I thought.
"It is just the two of us... right?"
As soon as Osamu left, Ayana pressed herself against me, climbing onto my lap - wait, could it be that these two were already involved before the game even starts!?
Is this NTR (Cuckoldry)?
BSS (I liked her first)?
